import { useRef } from 'react'
import './index.scss'

interface Props {
  setWordsCount: (value: number | undefined) => void
  setCharactersCount: (value: number | undefined) => void
  setSentencesCount: (value: number | undefined) => void
  setParagraphsCount: (value: number | undefined) => void
}

const TextArea = ({ setWordsCount, setCharactersCount, setSentencesCount, setParagraphsCount }: Props) => {
  const textAreaRef = useRef<HTMLTextAreaElement>(null);

  const handleTextAreaChange = () => {
    const textValue = textAreaRef.current?.value
    const wordsCountValue = (textValue?.trim() && textValue?.split(/\s+(?=\S)/).length) || 0
    const charactersCountValue = (textValue?.trim() && textValue?.split("").length) || 0
    const sentencesCountValue = (textValue?.trim() && textValue?.split(/[.?!]+(?=\s*\S)/).length) || 0
    const paragraphsCountValue = (textValue?.trim() && textValue?.split(/\r?\n+(?=\s*\S)/).length) || 0
    setWordsCount(wordsCountValue)
    setCharactersCount(charactersCountValue)
    setSentencesCount(sentencesCountValue)
    setParagraphsCount(paragraphsCountValue)
  }

  return <textarea className="text-area" placeholder="Paste your text here..." autoFocus onChange={handleTextAreaChange} ref={textAreaRef} />
}

export default TextArea
